name: Trierarch [DEMO]
description:
Made during the Greek MytholoJam2018. 

Command a Penteconter and navigate on the sea between different city states. 

Control keys: WASD + E

 

There are things I had to cut out last minute and things I'll definitively continue working on

Content cut

  • Trade mechanic (couldn't make it work in time)
  • Raiding Mechanic (useless without trade)
  • Monsters (too difficult to ram)

Objectives

  • Trade Mechanic
  • Raiding Mechanic
  • Better physic simulation
  • Monsters
  • AI
  • Gods' blessings system
  • Events
  • Animations
  • Music/sound
  • and of course better assets and effects
